尤 "especially, even more clearly" is not merely intensitive or emphatic. 見 "get to see" is a success verb. 情 is "the underlying reality of the creative situation".

患 is not fear of something but exposure to a problem/danger. *意 is not philosophical "ideas men have" but autobiographic: "my ideas". *稱 refers to correspondence: "correspond properly, capture properly", not equality. *物 refers not to things generally but to the things intended by one's 意 "ideas/notions".
文 is not philosophical "literary works" but autobiographic: "my literary works". *逮 "catch up with" is dramatic and provides a semantic VARIATIO of the 稱 above.
